headline: Is Kenvue’s (KVUE) Profitability Strengthening Despite Softer Sales Altering The Investment Case For Kenvue (KVUE)?
summary: Kenvue Inc. has reported its fourth-quarter 2025 results, with sales rising to US$3,780 million and net income reaching US$330 million, while full‑year sales eased to US$15.12 billion but net income increased to US$1.47 billion. The stronger earnings and higher earnings per share compared with the prior year, despite slightly lower annual sales, highlight Kenvue’s recent profitability improvement. We’ll now examine how this earnings outperformance, particularly the rise in full‑year net...
